headline: Comcast Shareholders Reject Proposal for Independent Chair
summary: Comcast shareholders have voted against a proposal to curb Chairman and Chief Executive Brian Roberts’s power by installing an independent chair on the company’s board.

headline: Comcast Corporation Announces Preliminary Results of 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders
summary: PHILADELPHIA, June 18, 2025--Comcast Corporation today announced the preliminary results of its 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders held this morning. Final voting results will be filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on a Form 8-K within four business days.
